Sophie Papaian
Yoga Teacher of Yogica

«I bend, so I don’t break»

Hey folks, I’m Sophie. I’m a certified Yoga and Mindfulness Teacher. Being a musician, I enjoy bathing people in healing sound frequencies, using a hand pan (hang drum), my voice tibetan bowls and other high frequency instruments.

I’ve been teaching different styles of yoga, focusing mainly on Hatha, Vinyasa, Meditation and Sound. I invite you to join me on my yoga journey and share happy moments together.

We are all related in love. May everyone know peace.

Training options

You can train in your personal account here, on this site, we can also send the training lessons to your telegram account, you can watch the video on your phone, on a computer or display it on your smart TV screen.
